apps/desktop/src/nlp/.description: Parsing engine uses dual-parser architecture: natural.ts (rule-based, fast, regex patterns, chrono-node) + llm-parse.ts (GPT-4.1-mini, complex NLU). Rule-based handles time parsing, patterns; LLM handles ambiguous input with pattern injection from learning system.

apps/desktop/src/learning/.description: Adaptive learning system with confidence-based auto-apply. Thresholds: 0.8+ auto-apply, 0.5-0.8 suggest, <0.5 ignore. Patterns learned from user behavior (accepts/rejects) with time decay over 30 days.

packages/parser/src/context/project-cont.description: LinkDecision type uses tier-based action mapping: HIGH tier (>= 0.85) maps to 'auto_apply', MEDIUM tier (>= 0.50) maps to 'suggest', LOW tier (< 0.50) maps to 'require_confirmation'. This pattern enables confidence-driven automation levels.

apps/desktop/src/nlp/natural.ts.description: Added habit completion detection via looksLikeHabitCompletion() and extractHabitDetails() functions. Detects past-tense habit completions like "did my workout", "brushed teeth", "took vitamins", "went to gym". Creates log events with #habit tag and optional duration/quantity metrics.

apps/desktop/src/__tests__/integration/h.description: Comprehensive integration test suite for habit completion flow. Tests detectHabitCompletion(), matchHabitFuzzy(), calculateMatchConfidence(), parseCaptureNatural(), and parseCaptureWithBlocks() for habit detection. Run with: cd apps/desktop && npm run test:integration

apps/desktop/src/__tests__/integration/p.description: Comprehensive integration test suite for project auto-linking with confidence tiers (34 tests). Tests autoLinkProject(), matchProjectFuzzy(), calculateMatchConfidence(), extractProjectReferences(), getAllProjectLinks() from project-context.ts. Verifies confidence tiers: HIGH (>= 0.85) -> auto_apply, MEDIUM (>= 0.50) -> suggest, LOW (< 0.50) -> require_confirmation. Run with: npx vitest run apps/desktop/src/__tests__/integration

apps/desktop/src/__tests__/integration/e.description: Comprehensive E2E test suite for all 5 entity types (93 tests). Verifies: Task ("I need to call mom tomorrow"), Event ("meeting at 3pm with John"), Note ("note: project deadline is Friday"), Tracker ("#mood(7)"), Habit ("did my workout"). Includes disambiguation tests, variations, classifier rules coverage, intent patterns, block parser integration. Run with: npx vitest run apps/desktop/src/__tests__/integration/entity-classification-e2e.test.ts
